attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This needs to be stopped as it preventing people from employment. 

It is vigilante in its intentions, and is very right wing. 

I am concerned that will lead us to world people never getting a jobs due to this register.

Think of the under-class it might create?

The damage it could do to someone on many levels is huge!

Vote against this right-wing political policy.

I believe it is unlawful under the following headings

No permission given by the person to transfer their details to this register.

Illegal to give a bad reference.

It borders on harassment, now and for years to come of a person due to their past.

It invades people's privacy.

And probably many more

PLEASE VOTE TO STOP THIS!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
